lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Treasury Secretary James Baker's comments that the G-6 nations remain committed to the Paris accord, coupled with his refusal to give any targets for exchange rates, provided a note of stability to the market Tuesday, the analysts said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The surge in currency futures since Friday on the heels of the Reagan administration's proposed tariffs on Japanese imports is likely to be curtailed in the coming week, financial analysts said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The market is taking a breather now, and I would expect it to last a little longer," said Craig Sloane, a currency analyst with Smith Barney, Harris, Upham and Co.
